author: robocopsgonemad
content: gm, am looking into besu asap. any interesting tx fuzzing going on around block 35137ish? Having a map of problematic txs/blocks being sent and when would help target analysis

author: robocopsgonemad
content: does this ever try to send more than 6 blobs in a block?

author: parithosh
content: afaik it just keeps pumping blobs and lets the client take care of the rest, they'd just sit in the mempool until included. The RPC is on a nethermind node, so besu would probably receive it via gossip and not directly to its RPC.
